Subbed Projects.Show Name: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch R2 Special Edition Zero Requiem

Good Comments: Simple, efficient, did the job release.
Some grammar errors but overall a fine sub.
Bad Comments: A lot of repeated words, grammar errors or plain mistranslations. Some were so bad they changed the original mood of the scene or make some scenes incomprehensible. A lot could've been prevented with a proof reader (or "watcher").
